p: Sex ratios in the immunity strata considered were unbiased relative to the source cohort, and we observed no differences by sex in antibody values ( appendix p 9), except among serostable Ghanaian children, for whom the geometric mean concentration increased between the two follow-up points in boys, from 1·52 IU/mL (95% CI 1·15–2·05) to 2·18 IU/mL (95% CI 1·66–2·91; p=0·016), but not in girls ( appendix pp 6, 10).
